name: Haunted.APK
description:
Introducing The Haunted APK: a collection of small VR games that will take you on a journey through the eerie, spine-tingling world of retro gaming.

Featuring 3  experiences and growing, this anthology will transport you back to a time when games invoked a sense of adventure and wonder. 

Each game in the anthology has been lovingly hand crafted, bringing the classic look and feel of games from the 90s to life with modern VR gameplay. 

Don't miss out on this chance to experience the terror of retro horror gaming like never before. Download The Haunted APK and let the nightmare begin!

Also available on Applab!

https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5381440905317900/

If you enjoy this and want to support the creation of cool VR experiences and/or try out my other games, consider joining my Patreon!

https://www.patreon.com/TabGames
